Gene description: Point mutations in the 16S rRNA of Mycobacteroides chelonae can confer resistance to gentamicin C
Point mutations in the helix 34 region of the rrsD 16S rRNA gene of Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium can confer resistance to spectinomycin
Point mutation in the 23S rRNA of Escherichia coli shown clinically to confer resistance to clarithromycin a macrolide antibiotic
